channel.title: mouse on Game6r
channel.description: Recent content in mouse on Game6r

item.title: Game Mouse Mario McBee
item.description: In this game you have to control a funny little man. He must run a certain distance, and you need to help the character overcome the obstacles that stand in the way. Their role is played by pipes of different heights. Quickly jump over them, trying to avoid a collision, otherwise you will immediately lose.

item.title: Ninja Mouse Game
item.description: During this game, unforgettable adventures await you, and in order to participate in them, you do not need anything but a mouse. You will turn into a fast and elusive ninja who must destroy enemies coming from all sides. Try not to hesitate so as not to miss any of the rivals, otherwise there is a risk of losing.
